qas.question: Who did Barcelona beat to win the 2015 UEFA Super Cup?
What team did Barcelona defeat to win the 2015 FIFA World Cup Final?
What was the only team to match Barcelona's record of trophy wins by 2015?
How many goals did Barcelona score to break the record for most goals in a year?
What teams previous record was 178 goals in a year?

context: On 11 August, Barcelona started the 2015–16 season winning a joint record fifth European Super Cup by beating <a0_0>Sevilla FC<a0_0/> 5–4 in the 2015 UEFA Super Cup. They ended the year with a 3–0 win over Argentine club <a1_0>River Plate<a1_0/> in the 2015 FIFA Club World Cup Final on 20 December to win the trophy for a record third time, with Suárez, Messi and Iniesta the top three players of the tournament. The FIFA Club World Cup was Barcelona's 20th international title, a record only matched by Egyptian club <a2_0>Al Ahly SC<a2_0/>. By scoring <a3_0>180<a3_0/> goals in 2015 in all competitions, Barcelona set the record for most goals scored in a calendar year, breaking <a4_0>Real Madrid<a4_0/>'s record of 178 goals scored in 2014.
